subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Joey Porter, the Miami Dolphins’ outspoken linebacker, was ruled out of Sunday’s game against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers because of a coach’s decision. The Dolphins did not give any information about the reason for the move by Coach Tony Sparano.
snippet: Joey Porter, the Miami Dolphins’ outspoken linebacker, was ruled out of Sunday’s game against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers because of a coach’s decision. The Dolphins did not give any information about the reason for the move by Coach Tony Sparano.
